title: special characters in messages
content: When I send messages with Latvian language special characters such as "ā, ē, ķ, ņ" etc they get sent as simple letters "a, e, k, n". I already tried changing languages and looking for gboard settings to fix this, but no luck. Anyone knows of a fix? I read that same has happened with other non-English languages, but couldn't find a solution.
